descriptionHtml:
Due to the up coming DLC DragonBorn And that iv lost all my work ill will not be updataing this 
----DEAD----
ok iv uploaded what i have so far, the sword and shield they just replace the orcish sword and shield, i will give them new id when Ckit comes out.
...........................................................................................................................
LET me know if its working or not.
...........................................................................................................................
3 files have been modified <for now>
Data\\meshes\\weapons\\orcish\\orcishsword
Data\\meshes\\weapons\\orcish\\1stpersonorcishsword
Data\\meshes\\Armor\\orcish\\orcishshield
...........................................................................................................................
Install
.
Just unpack the files in your data folder and overwrite if prompted.

...........................................................................................................................

ok so the idea of this mod is to add Stalhrim Armor and Weapons For crafting inc Stalhrim Ore.

...........................................................................................................................


if any one has any idea\'s or anythink they like to see in this mods plz post comment.
 
   
..........................................................................................................................
